ygData.subject: Re: Estate of Unrest
ygData.msgSnippet: Not guards... Those damn vendors or whatever those dwarves are in that ring... I got whacked at the zone to unrest by them a couple times...
ygData.messageBody:
Not guards... Those damn vendors or whatever those dwarves are in that
ring... I got whacked at the zone to unrest by them a couple times...


>From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Estate of Unrest
>Date: Thu, 22 Jul 1999 09:00:43 -0400
>
>From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
>
>There are no guards in Dagnors or unrest, what the hell are you talking
>about?
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Jerry Luttrell <tinarin@...>
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 9:45 PM
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Estate of Unrest
>
>
> > From: "Jerry Luttrell" <tinarin@...>
> >
> > Even as a dark elf it is easy... Follow the right zone barrier as high
>up
>as
> > you can go and you will be safe from guards,,, then in Dagnors swim all
>the
> > way to the unrest cave area... You'll get arount them all without invis
> > even... That is unless some idiot has trained the guards to the zone
> >
> >
> > >From: TkAdam@...
> > >Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> > >To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> > >Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Estate of Unrest
> > >Date: Wed, 21 Jul 1999 11:46:16 EDT
> > >
> > >From: TkAdam@...
> > >
> > >In a message dated 7/20/99 6:42:28 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
> > >AshcroftJT@... writes:
> > >
> > > > << I was planning a trip to Unrest tonight and was wondering if
>anyone
> > >had
> > > > any info on it that may be useful. Is it decent for a lvl 23 to
>solo?
> > >I
> > > > heard that there's usually alot of people there, so the risk of
> > >getting
> > >hit
> > > > by more than one MOB is low. Also, is there anywhere in Faydwer
>for
>a
> > >DE
> > >to
> > > > sell? As an outcast I was pretty sure there wasn't..... >>
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > Unrest is not a solo spot you'll do alot better getting in a
> > >group.....as
> > > > for
> > > > selling try the druid ring in BB near the crossroads (hard to find
>you
> > >may
> > > > want to look at a map first )> No where to bank though so 2
>days
>is
> > >max
> > > > I
> > > > could stay without heading home to neriak.
> > > >
> > >
> > >As a Dark Elf Necro... I would not even advise going there. EVERY
>guard,
> > >and
> > >NPC (especially the druids mentioned above) will be KOS. It will be a
> > >harowing trip. If you make it though, it ids a good place to learn :)
> > >
> > >Sonoroud Tomebinder.
